Summary: The object just hoovered and never moved. Very strange just sat could not have been a plain.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Smyrna
There was one other sighting in Smyrna on or around April 13th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home I saw this and stopped. I had a feeling to just look up and when I did they were there. They just hoovered and never moved. I took a picture. There are two objects. They are both close to the trees in the picture to the left. If you zoom in they look really interesting. Then when I got home there was one hoovering over my house with a red ring of lights around it. I tried to get a picture of this but it evaportated into the clouds. No kidding it disappeared like in the movies. They were not planes. Planes move. I have never really given stock all of this stuff, but I am slowly changing my mind and after this I am really changing my mind. I am excited since maybe now I can decided if I really believe or not. Leaning more towards time travelers then little green men.
